about_the_game:
Backstory

On a stormy night, a lightning bolt struck a tree, and electricity quickly spread across the ground. In an instant, scattered bones on the ground came to life. The skeletal figure slowly rose, shaky yet aware, as it became a creature with consciousness. However, it couldn't remember anything about its past.

In search of its lost memories, this nameless skeleton sets out on a journey of exploration and adventure.

Game Features

Exploration

The skeleton awakens on a mysterious island filled with unknown areas, waiting for players to delve in and uncover its secrets. Every corner hides fragments of the story, revealing the mysteries of the island.

Puzzles

Some areas cannot be accessed with the skeleton’s current abilities. Players need to advance through certain levels to acquire key items and solve puzzles. Levels are filled with various clues and hints—perhaps a series of numbers or a special symbol—that may be crucial for progression.

Storyline

Throughout the game, players will gradually recover lost memories, uncovering the skeleton’s mysterious origins. Some choices will influence the story’s direction, leading to different possible endings.

Additional Note

This game is still in development. If you're interested, please add it to your wishlist! This really means a lot to us—thank you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Lost Soul is a 2D side-scrolling adventure game blending action, exploration, and puzzle-solving elements. A nameless skeleton awakens on a stormy night and embarks on a journey of self-discovery, seeking to recover lost memories and uncover the truth.
